name: Ataxia: Espionage
description:
Infiltrate the base of heinous Ataxia Corp and take them out by any means necessary. You may choose to go in guns blazing or take a more tactical route by avoiding being seen. Either way this mission's not going to be a walk in the park!

  •  Classic top-down shooter gameplay
  •  20 levels and a boss
  •  Interactable environment
  •  Go in guns blazing or take a sneakier approach

The game was built by Team TV which consists of one programmer and one artist. Development time was about four months with most of the work done part time. Ataxia: Espionage is our final student project at Tampere University of Applied Sciences Games Academy.  Special thanks to Eric Matyas (soundimage.org) for providing us with music!
